Texts.Chs: 把^orange;酿酒工作台^reset;带给我。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;booze kit^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 你想自己酿酒？很好！我会帮你的。首先你要制造一个^orange;酿酒工作台^reset;。把它放到靠墙的地方，你就可以开始酿酒之路了！
Texts.Eng: So you want to make your own booze? Great! I'll help you. You must start by crafting a ^orange;Booze Kit^reset;. Place it against a wall and you can start your path to becoming a Brew Master!

Texts.Chs: 你的酿造启蒙之路已经开始了。在我们开始酿造工作之前，你必须先建造酿酒工作台，因为你会用到其他更多的东西
Texts.Eng: Your path to brewing enlightment has started. Before we really start with the alcohol though, you must first use the Booze Kit to craft the other stations you'll require.
